featured.text: In the 16th and 17th centuries, treasures from the Far East were carried along the road into the capital cities of Europe.
Amy treasured the gold bracelet Laura gave her.
Fifty years ago, teams of architects began restoring the historic treasures of the city.
The pyramid housed the pharaoh’s body together with priceless treasure, which would accompany him into the next world.
(21) listening well is a rare talent that everyone should treasure.

definition.zh_def: 珍寶；貴重的物品或財富。
definition.en_def: Valuable items or wealth, often in the form of gold, silver, or precious gems.
definition.example: The pirates buried their treasure on a deserted island.
